content:
WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl Struct

Definition

Provides methods for WorkflowInstance derived classes to access the functionality of the workflow runtime.

In this Article

protected struct WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl
Inheritance
Object
System.ValueType
WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl

Properties

HasPendingTrackingRecords

Called by the workflow runtime to determine whether this workflow instance has pending tracking records and a tracking participant.

public bool HasPendingTrackingRecords { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if this workflow instance has pending tracking records and a tracking participant; otherwise, false.

IsPersistable

Gets a value that indicates whether the WorkflowInstance is in a state where it can be persisted.

public bool IsPersistable { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the WorkflowInstance can be persisted; otherwise, false.

State

Gets the state of the WorkflowInstance.

public System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState State { get; }
Value
WorkflowInstanceState

One of the enumeration values that specifies the state of a WorkflowInstance.

TrackingEnabled

Called by the workflow runtime to determine whether tracking is enabled in this workflow instance.

public bool TrackingEnabled { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if tracking is enabled in this workflow instance; otherwise, false.

Methods

Abort()

Aborts the WorkflowInstance.

public void Abort ();

Remarks

Once Abort is called, most WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl APIs except Abort throw an InvalidOperationException.

Abort(Exception)

Aborts the WorkflowInstance using the specified exception.

public void Abort (Exception reason);
reason
Exception

The reason for aborting the WorkflowInstance.

Remarks

Once Abort is called, most WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl APIs except Abort throw an InvalidOperationException.

BeginFlushTrackingRecords(TimeSpan,AsyncCallback,Object)

Called by the workflow runtime to begin sending pending tracking records to tracking participants asynchronously.

public IAsyncResult BeginFlushTrackingRecords (TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
timeout
TimeSpan

The time period after which to abort the attempt.

callback
AsyncCallback

The method to be called when the track operation has completed.

state
Object

The information about the asynchronous operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The status of the current track operation.

EndFlushTrackingRecords(IAsyncResult)

Called by the workflow runtime to end the track operation.

public void EndFlushTrackingRecords (IAsyncResult result);
result
IAsyncResult

The status of the asynchronous track operation.

Equals(Object)

Returns a value that indicates whether the current WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl is equal to the specified object.

public override bool Equals (object obj);
obj
Object

The object to compare.

Returns
Boolean

true of the object is equal to the current WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl; otherwise, false.

FlushTrackingRecords(TimeSpan)

Called by the workflow runtime to send pending tracking records to tracking participants.

public void FlushTrackingRecords (TimeSpan timeout);
timeout
TimeSpan

The time period after which to abort the attempt.

GetAbortReason()

Returns the exception that causes the WorkflowInstance to abort.

public Exception GetAbortReason ();
Returns
Exception

The exception that caused the WorkflowInstance to abort, or null if the WorkflowInstance did not abort.

GetBookmarks()

Returns the collection of available bookmarks for the WorkflowInstance.

public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Activities.Hosting.BookmarkInfo> GetBookmarks ();
Returns
ReadOnlyCollection<BookmarkInfo>

A collection of bookmarks for the WorkflowInstance.

GetBookmarks(BookmarkScope)

Returns the collection of available bookmarks for the WorkflowInstance created in the specified BookmarkScope.

public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Activities.Hosting.BookmarkInfo> GetBookmarks (System.Activities.BookmarkScope scope);
scope
BookmarkScope

The bookmark scope to inspect.

Returns
ReadOnlyCollection<BookmarkInfo>

The collection of bookmarks created in the specified BookmarkScope.

GetCompletionState()

Returns the final ActivityInstanceState of the WorkflowInstance.

public System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState GetCompletionState ();
Returns
ActivityInstanceState

One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.

GetCompletionState(Exception)

Returns the final ActivityInstanceState of the WorkflowInstance, including termination exception.

public System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState GetCompletionState (out Exception terminationException);
terminationException
Exception

When this method returns, terminationException contains the exception that caused the WorkflowInstance to terminate, or null if the WorkflowInstance did not terminate. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

Returns
ActivityInstanceState

One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.

GetCompletionState(IDictionary<String,Object>,Exception)

Returns the final ActivityInstanceState of the WorkflowInstance, including workflow outputs and termination exception.

public System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState GetCompletionState (out System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,object> outputs, out Exception terminationException);
outputs
IDictionary<String,Object>

When this method returns, outputs contains a dictionary of ArgumentDirection arguments of the workflow, keyed by argument name. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

terminationException
Exception

When this method returns, terminationException contains the exception that caused the WorkflowInstance to terminate, or null if the WorkflowInstance did not terminate. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

Returns
ActivityInstanceState

One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.

GetHashCode()

Returns the hash code for this WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.

public override int GetHashCode ();
Returns
Int32

The hash code for this WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.

GetMappedVariables()

Returns a dictionary of variables in the current scope that have been specified with VariableModifiers.

public System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,System.Activities.Hosting.LocationInfo> GetMappedVariables ();
Returns
IDictionary<String,LocationInfo>

A dictionary of mapped variables currently in scope.

PauseWhenPersistable()

Requests that the workflow runtime pause the WorkflowInstance at the next point of execution where it is possible to persist. Note that the scheduler queue may not be empty at this point.

public void PauseWhenPersistable ();

PrepareForSerialization()

Prepares the WorkflowInstance state for serialization.

public object PrepareForSerialization ();
Returns
Object

A workflow instance state.

RequestPause()

Requests that the scheduler stops.

public void RequestPause ();

Run()

Instructs the WorkflowInstance to begin execution.

public void Run ();

ScheduleBookmarkResumption(Bookmark,Object)

Schedules a bookmark resumption with the specified value.

public System.Activities.BookmarkResumptionResult ScheduleBookmarkResumption (System.Activities.Bookmark bookmark, object value);
bookmark
Bookmark

The bookmark to resume.

value
Object

The data to be passed to the activity that created the Bookmark.

Returns
BookmarkResumptionResult

One of the enumeration values that indicates the result of a Bookmark scheduling operation.

ScheduleBookmarkResumption(Bookmark,Object,BookmarkScope)

Schedules a Bookmark resumption from the specified BookmarkScope.

public System.Activities.BookmarkResumptionResult ScheduleBookmarkResumption (System.Activities.Bookmark bookmark, object value, System.Activities.BookmarkScope scope);
bookmark
Bookmark

The bookmark to resume.

value
Object

The data to be passed to the activity that created the Bookmark.

scope
BookmarkScope

The Bookmark under which the Bookmark was created.

Returns
BookmarkResumptionResult

One of the enumeration values that indicates the result of a Bookmark scheduling operation.

ScheduleCancel()

Schedules the cancellation of the WorkflowInstance.

public void ScheduleCancel ();

Remarks

This method schedules a cancel request for the root activity of the WorkflowInstance.

Terminate(Exception)

Transitions the WorkflowInstance into the terminal ActivityInstanceState state using the specified exception.

public void Terminate (Exception reason);
reason
Exception

The exception that is the reason for terminating the WorkflowInstance.

Track(WorkflowInstanceRecord)

Called by the workflow runtime to add the specified pending record to the list of pending records.

public void Track (System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceRecord instanceRecord);
instanceRecord
WorkflowInstanceRecord

The tracking record to add.

Operators

op_Equality(WorkflowInstance+WorkflowInstanceControl,WorkflowInstance+WorkflowInstanceControl)

Returns a value that indicates whether two WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl instances are equal.

public static bool op_Equality (System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl left, System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl right);
left

The first WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl to compare.

right

The second WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl to compare.

Returns
Boolean

true if the two WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl instances are equal; otherwise, false.

op_Inequality(WorkflowInstance+WorkflowInstanceControl,WorkflowInstance+WorkflowInstanceControl)

Returns a value that indicates whether two WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl instances are not equal.

public static bool op_Inequality (System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl left, System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl right);
left

The first WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl to compare.

right

The second WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl to compare.

Returns
Boolean

true if the two WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl instances are not equal; otherwise, false.
